products.title: Broody Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Black as the night, this venetian blind will standout and give a crisp, smart finish to any window. Use in your bathroom or kichen, or alongside a black and white themed room to finish the room off. Venetian blinds give you full control over the light entering your home with the raise and tilt controls. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Latino Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Granite Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The matt grey finish on the granite aluminium blind makes this an excellent choice for any window in your home. products.title: Palate Peach Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Grey Perfora Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The grey perfora aluminium blind is unique with it's small light filtering holes, this will let more light in than other blinds, even when closed, but they help this blind to act more like a screen - gently filtering the light. Best used where privacy is not the most important feature of the blind, but being able to allow the light in is most important.
